# Attention Mechanisms

[Home](../../../../README.md) / [Cognitive Science](../../../../cognitive_science/README.md) / [Attention And Memory](../../../cognitive_science/attention_and_memory/README.md)

## Key Concepts

### Selective Attention

The ability to focus on specific stimuli while ignoring others, demonstrating how attention mechanisms filter and prioritize information.

### Divided Attention

The capacity to attend to multiple stimuli simultaneously, showing how attention can be distributed across different tasks or sources of information.

### Sustained Attention

The ability to maintain focus over extended periods, essential for tasks requiring continuous attention such as reading or problem-solving.
